MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY13 postcode area of Whitchurch, affecting properties in Pear Tree Lane and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of network investigations and repair on the underground cable network required. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:46PM on 18th October 2020.
